definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Objective To obtain effective materials from the total alkaloids of Fuzi Lizhong sustained-release tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析附子理中缓释片中总生物碱的药效物质。

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子与干姜的配伍，较好的反映了配伍七情的相对性。

sentences.english: Objective: To look for no-alkaloid components with pharmacological action in aconite roots.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找附子中具有药理作用的非生物碱类成分。

sentences.english: The two processing methods had a great impact on chemical ingredient of radix aconiti lateralis preparata.
sentences.chinese: 这两种炮制方法对附子品质有较大的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To obtain an average safe dose of Fuzi Lizhong sustained-release tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的确定附子理中缓释片的安全剂量。

sentences.english: Death can occur as quickly as ten minutes after initial contact to a few hours.
sentences.chinese: 在接触附子花几小时后，人可以在十分钟内死亡。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effects of plant hormones on the determination of polysaccharide of Aconitum carmichaili.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究植物激素对附子多糖含量的影响。

definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
